ThingDef.Name: MealBase
ThingDef.description: "Meal lacks desc."

ThingDef.Name: CannedBase
ThingDef.description: "Meal lacks desc."

ThingDef.label: Kibble
ThingDef.description: Kibble animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources.

ThingDef.label: Pemmican
ThingDef.description: A preserved mashed mixture of fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration.

ThingDef.label: Packaged Survival Meal
ThingDef.description: A high-quality packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations.

ThingDef.label: Nutrient Paste Meal
ThingDef.description: A synthetic mixture of protein, carbohydrates, vitamins, amino acids and minerals. Everything the body needs with an absolutely disgusting taste.

ThingDef.label: Simple Meal
ThingDef.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from a few ingredients.

ThingDef.label: Fine Meal
ThingDef.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.

ThingDef.label: Lavish Meal
ThingDef.description: An elborate concoction of food skillfully prepared into a succulent meal.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Meal
ThingDef.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.

ThingDef.label: Simple Salad
ThingDef.description: A simple salad made from gathered vegetables.

ThingDef.label: Jerky
ThingDef.description: Jerky made from raw meat.

ThingDef.label: Dried Fruit
ThingDef.description: Fruit that has had the water removed to increase it's shelf life.

ThingDef.label: Bread
ThingDef.description: A freshly baked loaf of bread.

ThingDef.label: Cheese
ThingDef.description: A block of cheese.

ThingDef.label: Burger
ThingDef.description: A simple burger made from bread and meat.

ThingDef.label: Cheese Burger
ThingDef.description: A burger made from bread, meat and cheese.

ThingDef.label: Deluxe Burger
ThingDef.description: A fine burger made from bread, meat, cheese, lettuce and tomato.

ThingDef.label: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ThingDef.description: Two slices of bread with cheese in the middle, grilled on both sides.

ThingDef.label: Pizza
ThingDef.description: Pizza in 30 minutes or less!

ThingDef.label: Fruit Yogurt
ThingDef.description: A sweet treat made from milk and fruit.

ThingDef.label: Chocolate Milk
ThingDef.description: Chocolate added to milk.

ThingDef.label: Roasted Meat
ThingDef.description: Freshly roasted meat.

ThingDef.label: Mushroom Stews
ThingDef.description: A stew containing mushrooms.

ThingDef.label: Salad with Mushrooms
ThingDef.description: A salad with mushrooms mixed in.

ThingDef.label: Pot Roast and Mushrooms
ThingDef.description: A meaty roast with mushrooms mixed in.

ThingDef.label: Fried Assorts
ThingDef.description: A simple fried assortment of vegetables. Not too nutritious or tasty.

ThingDef.label: Mushroom Tincture
ThingDef.description: A concentrated extract from mushrooms. A good, natural medicine source.

ThingDef.label: Antibiotics
ThingDef.description: A concentrated extract of Healroot and some hops. Tastes awful but boosts the immune system.

ThingDef.label: Cup of Tea
ThingDef.description: A drink made from brewing tea leaves.

ThingDef.label: Cup of Spectago Tea
ThingDef.description: A delicious preparation of brewed spectago leaves in water. Very pleasurable to drink.

ThingDef.label: Cup of Coffee
ThingDef.description: A cup of coffee.

ThingDef.label: Fruit Drink
ThingDef.description: A drink made by pressing fruit for their juice.

ThingDef.label: Caramel
ThingDef.description: A sweet candy made from sugar.

ThingDef.label: Taffy
ThingDef.description: A sweet, chewy candy.

ThingDef.label: Cookie
ThingDef.description: Freshly baked cookies!

ThingDef.label: Blueberry Pie Slice
ThingDef.description: A slice of blueberry pie.

ThingDef.label: Pumpkin Pie Slice
ThingDef.description: A slice of pumpkin pie.

ThingDef.label: Sweet Bun
ThingDef.description: A sweet roll covered in sugary icing.

ThingDef.label: Chocolate
ThingDef.description: A delicious preparation of cocoa seeds ground together with sugar and vanilla. Very pleasurable to eat, but not very nutritious.

ThingDef.label: Cigarillos
ThingDef.description: A pack of twenty cigarillos. Bet you can't smoke just one!

ThingDef.label: Cigar
ThingDef.description: A hefty cigar. When you prefer quality over quantity, you choose a cigar.

ThingDef.label: Herb Collection
ThingDef.description: A collection of herbs, ready to be smoked for relaxation.

ThingDef.label: Weed
ThingDef.description: It turns out that Frank may of been on to something when he burnt the weeds. It is quite soothing.

ThingDef.label: Weed Cigarette
ThingDef.description: Weed rolled into a cigarette. Got a light?

ThingDef.label: One Kick
ThingDef.description: A powerful drug that will boost you in many ways, but you might go insane.

ThingDef.label: Space Spice
ThingDef.description: A powerful drug from a refined chemical. I wonder what it does.

ThingDef.label: Weed Oil
ThingDef.description: Weed refined into oil. Maybe we can use it for something more then just getting high?

ThingDef.label: Soylent Green
ThingDef.description: Soylent Green is made from people, corpses that is. The taste varies from person to person.

ThingDef.label: Extra Canned Meal
ThingDef.description: A meal preserved in cans to prevent it from going bad.

ThingDef.label: Basic Canned Meal
ThingDef.description: A meal preserved in cans to prevent it from going bad.

ThingDef.label: Metal Canned Meat
ThingDef.description: A meal preserved in cans to prevent it from going bad.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Beer
ThingDef.description: The first beverage besides water ever consumed by mankind. Beer can taste good, but its main effect is intoxication. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol addiction.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Rum
ThingDef.description: A bottle filled with alcoholic rum. Why is the rum gone?

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Wine
ThingDef.description: A bottle of sweet, pinkish alcohol made from strawberries.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Sake
ThingDef.description: A bottle of crisp, refreshing alcohol made from rice.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Vodka
ThingDef.description: A bottle of clear, potato-based alcohol.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Whisky
ThingDef.description: A bottle of golden, corn-based alcohol.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Apple Cider
ThingDef.description: A bottle of sweet alcohol made from apples.

ThingDef.label: Bottle of Tequila
ThingDef.description: A bottle of golden, agave-based alcohol of storied reputation.

ThingDef.Name: Fluffy_CatFood
ThingDef.label: Processed Cat Food
ThingDef.description: Processed cat food, made bulkier by adding plant material and various artificial additives. Your cats are guaranteed to love it!
